actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that the provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining operations, sand and gravel mining operations, or shell mining operations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Mine Safety and Health Amendments Act of 1977 to state that provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining, and sand and gravel mining, or shell dredging operations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Mine Safety and Health Act of 1977 to provide that the provisions of such Act shall not apply to stone mining operations, sand and gravel mining operations, or shell mining operations.
